comments: Also every second odd prime. - _Cino Hilliard_, Dec 02 2007If n > 1, then a(n) is less than, and asymptotic to, the n-th Ramanujan prime R_n = A104272(n). Research questions on the difference R_n - a(n) are at A104272. - _Jonathan Sondow_, Dec 16 2013
links: Jens Kruse Andersen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Table[ Prime[ 2n], {n, 52}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 01 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [ NthPrime(2*n): n in [1..1000] ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 11 2011(PARI) a(n)=prime(2*n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 02 2013
